item.title: Reflections on the Creative Process - Illustrated with Watercolour Painting
item.description:
Description

Coding is a creative process. But we donâ€™t really learn about creativity, usually it's all exception handling and Big O complexity. This talk is about introspection and calm coding in the face of long stack traces. Also, I'll be doing a live watercolour painting at the same time.
item.dc:creator: Grace Nolan
